scone.console.ui.element



abstract class UIElement;
Parent of all elements. Comes with a variety of options.

@property auto id();
Returns:
string.

@property auto id(string id);
Set the id.

@property auto x();
Returns:
int.

@property auto x(int x);
Set the x.

@property auto y();
Returns:
int.

@property auto y(int y);
Set the y.

Returns:
string.

@property void text(string text);
Set the text.

Returns:
Color

Set the color.
